snippet: It’s Stephen Colbert’s final Comedy Central show tonight as he prepares to take over the “Late Show” on CBS, and tributes to him abound. Representative Nancy Pelosi’s appreciation on Instagram caught our eye.
abstract: It’s Stephen Colbert’s final Comedy Central show tonight as he prepares to take over the “Late Show” on CBS, and tributes to him abound. Representative Nancy Pelosi’s appreciation on Instagram caught our eye.
